data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Ta`izz who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ta‘izz, Yemen
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Ta‘izz, Yemen.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 547 believers in the state of Ta`izz the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, help the 547 believers in Ta`izz to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 2,613,352 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord, please remember the Persian people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 2,613,900 people living in Ta`izz.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Ta‘izz, Yemen a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Ta‘izz, Yemen has a population of 2,613,900.

We estimate Ta`izz has 547 people who might know Jesus, 4,640 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,608,712 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4,778 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Ta‘izz, Yemen to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.
